ygData.subject: Re: lindel has a gnome!
ygData.msgSnippet: You are right. Lindell does have two l s I wasn t sure how to spell it though. Good workj though. I m going to try to question him, hoping to change his mind.
ygData.messageBody:
You are right. Lindell does have two l's I wasn't sure how to spell it
though. Good workj though. I'm going to try to question him, hoping to
change his mind. Anyone have some good (but not rude) arguments I can use
when I present my "speech" to him?


>Hey I was in qeynos with my gnome today and I saw a Lindell (2 L's) but I
>didn't ask about the pole because like someone said, it might not be a good
>idea to scare him off. He was only on for a bit (at least i only saw him
>for
>a bit) he was talking to a friend whos name I forget and said he was gonna
>go play his gnome. So he does have a gnome char and his name spelling is
>Lindell. thats all I know. if its the same lindel/lindell.. Sorry i dont
>know more
>
><< text3.html >>
